CWEs: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values
CWE-780: Use of RSA Algorithm without OAEP
description: The function uses a cryptographic algorithm that is not secure. The function also uses a random value that is not sufficiently random, which can lead to predictability of the value. The function uses RSA algorithm without Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP), which can lead to various attacks such as padding oracle attacks.
